title: Around the World in 80 Days: Companion to the Pbs Series
description: The British actor and humorist describes his eighty-day journey around the world--by train, taxi, camel, dogsled, cargo ship, and balloon--following in the footsteps of the inimitable Phileas Fogg. Reprint. TV tie-in. 25,000 first printing. IP.
author: Michael Palin
